name: Prone
matches: ^Sweeping out with a blade hand, \w+l strikes at the back of (.+)'s knee\.$
^Drawing an enormous breath\, \w+ exhales\, expelling a gale of wind with such force that (.+) is knocked over\.$
^(.+) is knocked forcefully off (?:her|his) feet by the impact of \w+\'s huge tail\.$
^(.+)\'s eyes close suddenly as (?:she|he) falls asleep\.$
^(.+) is knocked off h(?:is|er) feet by the heaving ground\.$
^\w+ throws (?:his|her) palms forward, releasing a stream of deadly blue light to cripple (.+)\.$
^Drawing an enormous breath, you exhale, expelling a gale of wind with such force that (.+) is
(.+) is knocked forcefully off (?:his|her) feet by the impact of your huge tail\.$
^A .+ tangles itself in the legs of (.+), sending (?:him|her) sprawling to the ground\.$
^You knock the legs out from under (.+) and send (?:him|her) sprawling\.$
^(\w+) staggers and falls to the ground\.$
^A gust of wind strikes (.+)\, throwing (him|her) to the ground\.$
^The (?:.+) of (.+) buckles under the impact, and (she|he) goes sprawling\.$
